fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Agriculture, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Culture and media, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, Culture, International co-operation and development, Customs, Education and training, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Sport, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security, Communication, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives:
We follow the youth-related topics such as the EU youth strategy, Bologna process, Youth Employment initiative etc.  
We also have ongoing working groups and campaigns related to free trade, migration, fighting populism, minority rights, education and defence.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
ALDE Party 
European Liberal Forum 
IFLRY - International Federation of Liberal and Radical Youth 
European Youth Forum
goals__remit:
As youth wing of ALDE Party, our main goal is to connect like-minded organisations and young people from across Europe.  
We also represent them in Brussels, and maintain the appropriate links with our mother party, our parliamentary group, ALDE, and its MEPs.  
Besides attending several congresses in the EP we also organise an annual summer academy for young people in the Parliament together with ALDE Group.
